dialogue.sjis: ミューノがさらわれたなんて どこに連れて行かれたのか 手がかりを見つけないと！
dialogue.ascii: Murno has been kidnapped We need to hurry and find where they are taking her!

dialogue.sjis: トニカク 町ノ中ヲ クマナク サガシマショウ
dialogue.ascii: Then Let Us Make Haste And Search The Entire Town.

male.sjis: そうだな
male.ascii: Got it

female.sjis: そうだね
female.ascii: Got it

dialogue.sjis: もしかして ザックなら何か知ってるかも
dialogue.ascii: Maybe Zakk knows something.

dialogue.sjis: ミューノがさらわれたなんて どこに連れて行かれたのか 手がかりを見つけないと！
dialogue.ascii: Murno has been kidnapped We need to hurry and find where they are taking her!

dialogue.sjis: とにかく町の中を くまなくさがすのじゃ！ ネズミ１匹見逃すでないぞ！
dialogue.ascii: Let us search throughout the entire town! Let none of those vermin escape!

male.sjis: わかった！
male.ascii: Roger that!

female.sjis: うん！
female.ascii: Yeah!

dialogue.sjis: もしかして ザックなら何か知ってるかも
dialogue.ascii: Maybe Zakk knows something.

dialogue.sjis: ミューノがさらわれたなんて どこに連れて行かれたのか 手がかりを見つけないと！
dialogue.ascii: Murno has been kidnapped We need to hurry and find where they are taking her!

dialogue.sjis: とにかく町の中を くまなくさがすんだ！ グズグズするな！
dialogue.ascii: So stop dragging your feet and start searching the town!

male.sjis: わかった！
male.ascii: Roger that!

female.sjis: うん！
female.ascii: Yeah!

dialogue.sjis: もしかして ザックなら何か知ってるかも
dialogue.ascii: Maybe Zakk knows something.

dialogue.sjis: ミューノがさらわれたなんて どこに連れて行かれたのか 手がかりを見つけないと！
dialogue.ascii: Murno has been kidnapped We need to hurry and find where they are taking her!

dialogue.sjis: とにかく町の中を 色々さがしてみましょう！
dialogue.ascii: Then let's search the whole town. They could be anywhere!

male.sjis: そうだな
male.ascii: Got it

female.sjis: そうだね
female.ascii: Got it

dialogue.sjis: もしかして ザックなら何か知ってるかも
dialogue.ascii: Maybe Zakk knows something.

male.sjis: アニスたちはスレンジ採掘場の方へ 向かったらしいぞ ザックが追いかけてるみたいだけど
male.ascii: Anise and the others seem to be heading to the Surange Mines. Looks like Zakk's after them too.

female.sjis: アニスたちはスレンジ採掘場の方へ 向かったらしいよ ザックが追いかけてるみたいだけど
female.ascii: Anise and the others seem to be heading to the Surange Mines. Looks like Zakk's after them too.

dialogue.sjis: 彼ガ 発見サレタ場合 あにすタチニ 危害ヲ加エラレル 可能性ガアリマス
dialogue.ascii: The Boy Has Been Caught. The Probability of Anise's Cohorts Harming Him Is Very High.

male.sjis: そうだな
male.ascii: Yeah, you're right

female.sjis: そうだね
female.ascii: True, you're right

dialogue.sjis: 急ごう！
dialogue.ascii: So let's hurry!

male.sjis: アニスたちはスレンジ採掘場の方へ 向かったらしいぞ ザックが追いかけてるみたいだけど
male.ascii: Anise and the others seem to be heading to the Surange Mines. Looks like Zakk's after them too.

female.sjis: アニスたちはスレンジ採掘場の方へ 向かったらしいよ ザックが追いかけてるみたいだけど
female.ascii: Anise and the others seem to be heading to the Surange Mines. Looks like Zakk's after them too.

dialogue.sjis: アノこぞうめ、ムチャしおって 連中に見つかったら、何をされるか わからんぞ
dialogue.ascii: The boy is a brash one. There's no telling what they may do to him if he's caught!

male.sjis: そうだな
male.ascii: Yeah, you're right

female.sjis: そうだね
female.ascii: True, you're right

dialogue.sjis: 急ごう！
dialogue.ascii: So let's hurry and save him!

male.sjis: アニスたちはスレンジ採掘場の方へ 向かったらしいぞ ザックが追いかけてるみたいだけど
male.ascii: Anise and the others seem to be heading to the Surange Mines. Looks like Zakk's after them too.

female.sjis: アニスたちはスレンジ採掘場の方へ 向かったらしいよ ザックが追いかけてるみたいだけど
female.ascii: Anise and the others seem to be heading to the Surange Mines. Looks like Zakk's after them too.

dialogue.sjis: ヤツひとりで連中の跡をつけて 無事でいられるとでも思っているのか 全く、身の程をわきまえない子供だ
dialogue.ascii: Even if the brat found them on his own, there's nothing he could do! Hah, this is why I can't stand kids.

dialogue.sjis: とにかく急ごう！
dialogue.ascii: We have to hurry and save him!

male.sjis: アニスたちはスレンジ採掘場の方へ 向かったらしいぞ ザックが追いかけてるみたいだけど
male.ascii: Anise and the others seem to be heading to the Surange Mines. Looks like Zakk's after them too.

female.sjis: アニスたちはスレンジ採掘場の方へ 向かったらしいよ ザックが追いかけてるみたいだけど
female.ascii: Anise and the others seem to be heading to the Surange Mines. Looks like Zakk's after them too.

dialogue.sjis: あの人たちに見つかったら 何をされるかわかりませんわ 無事ならいいんですけど
dialogue.ascii: There's no telling what they would do if they found him. I hope he's okay

male.sjis: そうだな
male.ascii: Yeah, you're right

female.sjis: そうだね
female.ascii: True, you're right

dialogue.sjis: 急ごう！
dialogue.ascii: So let's hurry!

male.sjis: くっそー、あいつら ザックにまであんなことを 絶対ゆるさないぜ！
male.ascii: Those jerks They hurt Zakk! I absolutely won't forgive them!

female.sjis: あの人たち、ザックにまで ヒドイことするなんて 絶対ゆるさないから！
female.ascii: Those jerks Why would they hurt Zakk like this!? I absolutely won't forgive them!

dialogue.sjis: アナタガ怒ルノハ 理解デキマスガ 落チ着イテクダサイ 冷静ニ行動シナイト 危険デス
dialogue.ascii: I Understand That This Upsets You, But We Need To Stay Put. It Is Not Advisable To Proceed Unprepared.

male.sjis: そうだな、わかった あいつらはスポート洞窟の奥だ 急ごう！
male.ascii: Oh yeah I get it now. They went to Spoat Grotto! Let's go!

female.sjis: そうだね、わかった あの人たちはスポート洞窟の奥みたい 急ごう！
female.ascii: Oh yeah I get it now. They went to Spoat Grotto! Let's go!

male.sjis: くっそー、あいつら ザックにまであんなことを 絶対ゆるさないぜ！
male.ascii: Those jerks They hurt Zakk! I absolutely won't forgive them!

female.sjis: あの人たち、ザックにまで ヒドイことするなんて 絶対ゆるさないから！
female.ascii: Those jerks Why would they hurt Zakk like this!? I absolutely won't forgive them!

dialogue.sjis: 落ち着くのじゃ、 そんな風に、頭に血が上っておると おぬしもケガをしてしまうぞ
dialogue.ascii: Don't be so hasty, Letting your blood go to your head will cause you nothing but harm.

male.sjis: そうだな、わかった あいつらはスポート洞窟の奥だ 急ごう！
male.ascii: Oh yeah I get it now. They went to Spoat Grotto! Let's go!

female.sjis: そうだね、わかった あの人たちはスポート洞窟の奥みたい 急ごう！
female.ascii: Oh yeah I get it now. They went to Spoat Grotto! Let's go!

male.sjis: くっそー、あいつら ザックにまであんなことを 絶対ゆるさないぜ！
male.ascii: Those jerks They hurt Zakk! I absolutely won't forgive them!

female.sjis: あの人たち、ザックにまで ヒドイことするなんて 絶対ゆるさないから！
female.ascii: Those jerks Why would they hurt Zakk like this!? I absolutely won't forgive them!

dialogue.sjis: ふん そんなに熱くなっていて ヤツらとまともに戦えるのか？
dialogue.ascii: Hmph You think you can even stand up to them with that hot head of yours?

male.sjis: そうか、ありがとう あいつらはスポート洞窟の奥だ 落ちついて行くぜ！
male.ascii: Oh yeah I get it now. They went to Spoat Grotto! Let's go!

female.sjis: そうか、ありがとう あの人たちはスポート洞窟の奥みたい 落ちついて行こう！
female.ascii: Oh yeah I get it now. They went to Spoat Grotto! Let's go!

male.sjis: くっそー、あいつら ザックにまであんなことを 絶対ゆるさないぜ！
male.ascii: Those jerks They hurt Zakk! I absolutely won't forgive them!

female.sjis: あの人たち、ザックにまで ヒドイことするなんて 絶対ゆるさないから！
female.ascii: Those jerks Why would they hurt Zakk like this!? I absolutely won't forgive them!

dialogue.sjis: 落ち着いてください そんな風にカッカしてると あなたまでやられてしまいますわ
dialogue.ascii: Please hold for a moment. Nothing good will come out of you acting irrationally, you know.

male.sjis: そうだな、わかった あいつらはスポート洞窟の奥だ 急ごう！
male.ascii: Oh yeah I get it now. They went to Spoat Grotto! Let's go!

female.sjis: そうだね、わかった あの人たちはスポート洞窟の奥みたい 急ごう！
female.ascii: Oh yeah I get it now. They went to Spoat Grotto! Let's go!

dialogue.sjis: パイクと親方がスポート洞窟の 奥へ行っちゃったよ 急いで追いかけよう！
dialogue.ascii: Pike and Master are heading deeper into Spoat Grotto. Let's hurry and catch up to them!

dialogue.sjis: 今ノトコロ 彼ガ みゅーの様ノ 行方ヲ知ル 唯一ノ手ガカリデス 意識ガアルウチニ 追イツキマショウ

male.sjis: 親方 たのむからムチャするなよな
male.ascii: Master I beg of you please, don't do anything too rash!

female.sjis: 親方ぁ たのむからムチャしないでよね
female.ascii: Master I beg of you please, don't do anything too rash!

dialogue.sjis: パイクと親方がスポート洞窟の 奥へ行っちゃったよ 急いで追いかけよう！
dialogue.ascii: Pike and Master are heading deeper into Spoat Grotto. Let's hurry and catch up to them!

dialogue.sjis: くやしいが、ミューノの行方を知る 唯一の手がかりが、あの男じゃ 生きてるうちに、追いつこうぞ
dialogue.ascii: I loathe to admit, but he's the only one who knows Murno's whereabouts. Let's get to him while he's awake.

male.sjis: 親方 たのむからムチャするなよな
male.ascii: Master I beg of you please, don't do anything too rash!

female.sjis: 親方ぁ たのむからムチャしないでよね
female.ascii: Master I beg of you please, don't do anything too rash!

dialogue.sjis: パイクと親方がスポート洞窟の 奥へ行っちゃったよ 急いで追いかけよう！
dialogue.ascii: Pike and Master are heading deeper into the Spoat Grotto. Let's hurry and catch up to them!

dialogue.sjis: そうだな ヤツにトドメをさすのは私だ あの女ではない
dialogue.ascii: Yes But I am the only one who gets to finish him. Not her.

male.sjis: たのむよ 今のところミューノの手がかりは あいつだけなんだからさ
male.ascii: Please don't do it He's the only one who knows where Murno is! We need him alive.

female.sjis: たのむよ 今のところミューノの手がかりは あいつだけなんだよ
female.ascii: Please don't do it He's the only one who knows where Murno is! We need him alive.

dialogue.sjis: パイクと親方がスポート洞窟の 奥へ行っちゃったよ 急いで追いかけよう！
dialogue.ascii: Pike and Master are heading deeper into Spoat Grotto. Let's hurry and catch up to them!

dialogue.sjis: 今のところミューノさまの 唯一の手がかりが、あの男ですからね 口がきける間に追いつきましょう！
dialogue.ascii: That man is the only one who knows Lady Murno's whereabouts, I think. Let's ask him while we can!

male.sjis: 親方 たのむからムチャするなよな
male.ascii: Master I beg of you please, don't do anything too rash!

female.sjis: 親方ぁ たのむからムチャしないでよね
female.ascii: Master I beg of you please, don't do anything too rash!

male.sjis: ミューノはスポート洞窟の奥だ！ 先に行った親方たちを 追いかけよう！
male.ascii: Murno's still further in! Master already went ahead of us, So let's hurry up and go!

female.sjis: ミューノはスポート洞窟の奥だよ！ 先に行った親方たちを 追いかけよう！
female.ascii: Murno's still further in! Master already went ahead of us, So let's hurry up and go!

dialogue.sjis: 私タチノ到着ヲ みゅーの様ガ 待ッテイルハズデス 急ギマショウ！
dialogue.ascii: Lady Murno Is Awaiting Our Arrival As Of Present. Let Us Make Haste!

dialogue.sjis: よっしゃ！ あいつらを全員とっつかまえて ミューノを取り返すんだ！
dialogue.ascii: Alright! Now that they've been dealt with, we're getting Murno back in no time!

dialogue.sjis: これで最後にしてやるぜ！
dialogue.ascii: Now it's finally over!

dialogue.sjis: よぉし！ あいつらを全員捕まえて ミューノを取り返そう！
dialogue.ascii: Yippie! Now that they've been dealt with, we're getting Murno back in no time!

dialogue.sjis: これで最後にしてみせる！
dialogue.ascii: Now it's finally over!

male.sjis: ミューノはスポート洞窟の奥だ！ 先に行った親方たちを 追いかけよう！
male.ascii: Murno's still further in! Master already went ahead of us, so let's hurry up and go!

female.sjis: ミューノはスポート洞窟の奥だよ！ 先に行った親方たちを 追いかけよう！
female.ascii: Murno's still further in! Master already went ahead of us, so let's hurry up and go!

dialogue.sjis: 急ぐのじゃ！ きっと今ごろミューノは 我らが来るのを心待ちにしておるぞ
dialogue.ascii: Let us make haste! I am certain that Murno eagerly awaits our arrival.

dialogue.sjis: よっしゃ！ あいつらを全員とっつかまえて ミューノを取り返すんだ！
dialogue.ascii: Alright! Now that they've been dealt with, we're getting Murno back in no time!

dialogue.sjis: これで最後にしてやるぜ！
dialogue.ascii: Now it's finally over!

dialogue.sjis: よぉし！ あいつらを全員捕まえて ミューノを取り返そう！
dialogue.ascii: Yippie! Now that they've been dealt with, we're getting Murno back in no time!

dialogue.sjis: これで最後にしてみせる！
dialogue.ascii: Now it's finally over!

male.sjis: ミューノはスポート洞窟の奥だ！ 先に行った親方たちを 追いかけよう！
male.ascii: Murno's still further in! Master already went ahead of us, So let's hurry up and go!

female.sjis: ミューノはスポート洞窟の奥だよ！ 先に行った親方たちを 追いかけよう！
female.ascii: Murno's still further in! Master already went ahead of us, So let's hurry up and go!

dialogue.sjis: 急いだ方がいいんじゃないか？ キサマが来るのがあまりにおそいから 今ごろあいつ、怒っているぞ
dialogue.ascii: Then why haven't you? She's gonna be upset if you're just dawdling around.

dialogue.sjis: そうだな、急ごう！ あいつらを全員とっつかまえて ミューノを取り返すんだ！
dialogue.ascii: You're right, let's hurry! With those guys now dealt with, we're getting Murno back in no time!

dialogue.sjis: これで最後にしてやるぜ！
dialogue.ascii: Now it's finally over!

dialogue.sjis: そうだね、急ごう！ あいつらを全員捕まえて ミューノを取り返そう！
dialogue.ascii: You're right, let's hurry! With those guys now dealt with, we're getting Murno back in no time!

dialogue.sjis: これで最後にしてみせる！
dialogue.ascii: Now it's finally over!

male.sjis: ミューノはスポート洞窟の奥だ！ 先に行った親方たちを 追いかけよう！
male.ascii: Murno's still further in! Master already went ahead of us, So let's hurry up and go!

female.sjis: ミューノはスポート洞窟の奥だよ！ 先に行った親方たちを 追いかけよう！
female.ascii: Murno's still further in! Master already went ahead of us, So let's hurry up and go!

dialogue.sjis: 急ぎましょう！ きっと今ごろミューノ様は 私たちを待ちつかれていますわ！
dialogue.ascii: Then onwards we shall go! I am certain that Lady Murno awaits us right now.

dialogue.sjis: よっしゃ！ あいつらを全員とっつかまえて ミューノを取り返すんだ！
dialogue.ascii: Alright! Now that they've been dealt with, we're getting Murno back in no time!

dialogue.sjis: これで最後にしてやるぜ！
dialogue.ascii: Now it's finally over!

dialogue.sjis: よぉし！ あいつらを全員捕まえて ミューノを取り返そう！
dialogue.ascii: Yippie! Now that they've been dealt with, we're getting Murno back in no time!

dialogue.sjis: これで最後にしてみせる！
dialogue.ascii: Now it's finally over!
